ModulePrefs.title: Google+ Comments
ModulePrefs.description: Google+ Comments gadget includes google+ widget plugin for comments, Facebook share button, Linkedin Share button, Twitter tweet button, Twitter follow button, and Google plus one button.
ModulePrefs.author: Simon Garcia

UserPref.name: if_custom_domain
UserPref.display_name: Will not display gadget on (sites.google.com) URLs if checked. Displays only on custom domain.

UserPref.name: announce_page_url
UserPref.display_name: Will not display gadget on URL placed here. eg: Announcements page (optional)

UserPref.name: if_tweet_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Twitter tweet button if checked. (uncheck to not display)

UserPref.name: if_twfollow_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Twitter follow button if checked. (uncheck to not display) (username required)

UserPref.name: if_fbshare_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Facebook share button if checked. (uncheck to not display)

UserPref.name: if_inshare_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Linkedin share button if checked. (uncheck to not display)

UserPref.name: if_pin_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Pin it button if checked. (uncheck to not display)

UserPref.name: if_gplus_bool
UserPref.display_name: Will display Google plus one button if checked. (uncheck to not display)

UserPref.name: g_page_id
UserPref.display_name: Google+ Page ID Number. eg: https://plus.google.com/[ID_Number]

UserPref.name: get_data_width
UserPref.display_name: Sets the width of the comments widget.
